name: Traveler (BAVC Next-Gen)
description:
In the far future, a time traveler’s time device malfunctions, sending them to San Francisco in the present. They must navigate through the city to find a way home.

Controls: Arrow keys to move Space Bar to jump X key for dialogue

Created by Ian Wong, 2021

This semester in Game Code Design students worked on portraying themes of mental wellbeing and exploration by developing a simple 2D side scroller game set in San Francisco. As their player will move through the city, they’ll stop to engage in playful dialogue with other characters.
